title: *Super Chic Storefront Gallery!Live/Work 1750sf Bock BlueLineWestTown*
posting_body: ['*1750sf 2BR Live/Work Gallery Storefront Loft, Block to Blue Line,West Town**', '*Super Chic Storefront Gallery!Live/Work 1750sf Bock BlueLineWestTown**', '***A Prime commercial location right at the Kennedy Expressway on Division Street....', 'in the heart of West Town & Wicker Park ***', '1418 W. Division Street Storefront Gallery Lofty…', '*A very grand space, steps from the Blue Line in Wicker Park one block from the Milwaukee, Division Ashland Triangle **** next to a very professional Hair Salon!', 'Very Very Secure Area !', 'Across the Street from the very influential Near North Montessori School at 1434 W. Division St.!', 'Now Just Look...', 'Unique and very special, and its just one block from the Blue Line in Wicker Park at the Milwaukee, Division Ashland Triangle ****', '1418 W. Division Street Storefront Gallery', '***', 'Available August 31, 2022 ****', 'at $ 2,250.00 net (no taxes, no additional assessments) , a very, very compelling deal for a Prime Division Street Storefront space....', 'Please call cell phone 773 726 2100 sheldon *** no texts please, voice only ***', 'Currently a Graphics Art Gallery, but this is the kind of place that is a Stunning Retail, Specialty Store, Professional Services Space, Professional Art Gallery, Clothing Apparel, Record/Music Store, Antique Gallery or Professional Live/Work space....lots of possibilities!', 'And Street parking is plentiful in the area.', 'The space features soaring 15 high foot ceilings and huge oversized full height', 'Storefront Glass windows, with plenty of show floor space.', 'Complementing these massive windows is lots of natural sunlight and stunning skyline views from windows inside the storefront loft.', "A painted front adjacent mural fence which can be customized further highlights the space's physical presence.....", 'The space is divided into three large areas.....', 'the front of the space is a gigantic main gallery area, with a special feature.....a wonderful Art Deco Bar and Cabinets backdrop filled with beautiful lighted stained glass.', 'The middle area of the space is a more intimate and private area and an extension of the front gallery,', 'which can be used special settings or events....', 'The back area of the space is a very large open with a huge elevated wooden lofted studio space ....', 'that can double for a work studio, professional office, work space, or massive storage....', 'There’s plenty of electrical power with two 220Volt dedicated electrical line for specialized appliances.', 'And in addition, there a dedicated water service line perfect for manufacturing needs…-', 'The space also feature very cool art deco lighting and wonderful storage throughout.', 'As a bonus, the space features a cool kitchen area nook with a nice frig with icemaker, gloss black Whirlpool kitchen stove , wood countertops, and Kohler double bowl stainless steel sink.', 'There is a Very Cool Dainty Bath with beautiful natural color granite title floors..........and an wonderful art deco bathtub on legs that has been wonderfully kept...', 'Topping off this very special storefront loft......is a beautiful outdoor patio and yard....that you can hold special events and has wonderful plant life with lots of shade from a large back yard tree...', 'The unit also has reserved parking available.', 'NO smoking please.', 'Come see this very special super chic storefront loft in the heart of Wicker Park, close to the loop, steps from the Blue Line El, 1 block to Kennedy today.', 'Cable and dsl ready.', 'Please call cell phone 773 726-2100 sheldon *** no texts please, voice only ***']
